utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Should we tell Rachel there’s an empty private room right next door to hers?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We could, or we can have sex in it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well let me think about that, while I remove my pants!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay mister! Fertilize me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Does that sound like Janice?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If it’s not, then there’s two of them. And that would mean it’s the end of the world!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe this is taking so long. How are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh not bad. Do you know that feeling when you’re trying to blow a Saint Bernard out your ass?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Weirdest thing. Did I hear——Mother of God it’s true!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Chandler Bing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jan-Janice!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not just Janice, Janice in labor, contracting and everything.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, this should be easy. I have a very wide pelvis. You remember Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice I didn’t even know you were pregnant! Who’s the unwitting human who’s essence you’ve stolen?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: It’s you. This is yours.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Look how nervous he gets! We haven’t slept together in years!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s funny. Does it-does it hurt? Does the labor hurt?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay I’ve got one for you, if you had too which one would you rather eat, a seeing eye dog or a talking gorilla?

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: I’d have to say…the talking gorilla, because at least I can explain to him that you’re making me eat him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Somebody went to college. Wow. What is it? I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: No, I’m sorry. It’s just my foot itches like crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I’ll get it.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: Wow! I usually get to know a girl a little better before I let her spoon me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Relax, it’s not like we’re forking.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that’s five Ross. Five women have had five babies! And I have had no babies! Why doesn’t she want to come out?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what I think it is? I think you’ve made such a nice home for her over the last nine months that she just doesn’t want to leave.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Look at you making up crap for me. Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Twenty-one hours, you’re a hero.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Doctor you gotta do something! I think you gotta give me drugs or you gotta light a fire up in there and just smoke it out.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Actually, I think you’re ready to go to the delivery room.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Ten centimeters, you’re about to become a mom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My God. Okay. Ha-ha-ha beat ya! Sucker!

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: Is this the same spoon that was in my cast?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know what? This one is.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s the doctor who was in my room before!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Huh. Okay, Mr. Perkazet.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: I’m telling you! The guy from that show was here in my room, asking me all these weird questions!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Cliff, do you really believe that a character from a TV show was here in your room?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rachel’s having her baby!! Which is of no interest to me, I’m a neurologist.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: That-that’s him! You know him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. I—Okay umm…this…I-I sent my friend Joey in here to find out stuff about you. Umm y’know, if it helps you came off great. A lot better than I’m coming off right now.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: I don’t believe this. You got him to pretend he was some fake doctor?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fake? Excuse me? Hello?

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: And then you tried to make me think that I was crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re right, that was wrong. I’m sorry. I’m so sorry. It’s just that I liked you so much. Can we just, can we just start over?

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, if I may? Umm-umm look, Cliff, you told me a lot of personal stuff about you, right? And maybe-maybe it would if-if would help if-if you knew some personal stuff about her. Uh, she was married to a gay ice dancer. Uh, she gave birth to her brother’s triplets. Oh! Oh! Her-her twin sister used to do porn!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh Joey, we’re trying to dial down the crazy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, look we don’t, we don’t really know each other so it would be really easy to just forget about this, but there seems to be something between us. And I don’t know about you but that doesn’t happen to me a lot.

utterance.speaker: Cliff
utterance.content: It doesn’t happen to me either.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me neither.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Push. Push. Come on push for five seconds. 5…4…

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Okay, the next contraction should be in about twenty seconds.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t. I can’t push anymore, I can’t.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sweetie you’re doing great.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God twenty seconds my ass!!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Here we go! Okay, keep pushing! Wait! I see something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? You do? You do? Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Don’t say, "Oh my God!" Oh my God what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is that?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: It’s the baby’s buttock, she’s breech.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh thank God, I thought she had two heads.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God. Is she gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: She’s gonna be fine. Okay, she’s in a more difficult position so you’re gonna have to push even harder now. Go! Push!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Rachel you’re gonna have to push even harder, nothing’s happening!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I can’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes you can!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! Come on! You can! I know you can do this! Let’s go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t. Please, you do it for me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Come on let’s—One more time! One final push! Ready? 1…2…3!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Good!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Keep pushing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You have no idea how much this hurts. Keep going! Keep going!

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Here we go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Oh! She’s upside down but she’s coming! She’s coming!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! Oh my God oh! Oh my God she’s here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh she’s…she’s perfect.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, she’s so tiny. Where’d she go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh it’s okay. They’re just-they’re just wrapping her up.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Well be careful with her, she’s really tiny.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Here she is!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh hey you. Thanks for coming out of me. I know. Oh. Yeah. Oh, she’s looking at me. Hi! I know you.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: Do we have a name yet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, not yet.

utterance.speaker: Dr. Long
utterance.content: That’s fine, for now we’ll just call her Baby Girl Green.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, Baby Girl Geller-Green.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello baby girl.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Can we come in?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, come in.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There she is!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, she’s so beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! She’s amazing. Oh, oh I’m so glad you guys got drunk and had sex!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s incredible, I mean one minute she’s inside you and then 47 hours later here she is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She looks so real! Y’know what I mean! She’s this whole tiny little person. She already has eyelashes and knees and…uh-oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no-no, no for I second there I counted six fingers, but one was from the other hand so we’re good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, my turn. My turn. Oh! You’re so cute! Oh, I could squeeze your little head! I won’t.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh nothing I… Sorry, I just can’t stop crying.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The doctor says it’s completely normal with all the hormones. Plus, you-you’re sleep deprived.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So? You guys are all sleep deprived. I don’t see you weeping because you put your slippers on the wrong feet. Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s the matter now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I was reliving it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, do you know what you’re gonna call her yet?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, wait a minute it’s not gonna be Baby Girl? I thought that was so original!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh actually, we-we’ve narrowed it down to two names.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and y’know what? I love them both, so why don’t you just pick one and that’ll be it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Umm, okay uh…everyone…this…is Isabella. What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s not her name! I’m sorry, she just doesn’t feel like an Isabella.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So then I guess Ferdinad is out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What was the other one Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, Delilah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh great! Suddenly she sounds like a biblical whore.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So I guess we’re back to uh, Baby Girl.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well what are we going to do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s okay honey, you’ll find a name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ugh, easy for you to say, you already know what your kids names are going to be.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ve had them picked out since I was fourteen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no, it’s gonna be named after some snack or baked good isn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well tell us! What are they?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, okay. If it’s a boy it’s Daniel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And if it’s a girl?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t want to say.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, just tell us! We’re not gonna want it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. It’s Emma.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Emma! See? I don’t want it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Take it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s clearly an Emma.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh honey, but you love that name.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but I love you more. Besides y’know, nothing goes with Bing. So I’m screwed. I mean… Oh, hi Emma. Yeah, that’s you. You’re our little Em. Oh what’s that honey? What? Oh, you want a little cousin? You want a cousin right now?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was amazing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know. Hey, do you realize we may have just changed our lives forever? We may have just started a family. Nine months from now we can be here, having our own baby.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And if not, we got to do it on a bucket.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Yoo-hoo! Aaron Litman-Neurolic would like to say hello to his future bride.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh! Wow! He kinda takes your breath away doesn’t he?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: He’s a keeper. How are you feeling?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Can I just say, I really admire what you’re doing. Just raising her all alone.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I’m not doing it alone. I have Ross.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, sure. Now. But what happens when he meets somebody else and gets married?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then he gets a divorce, it’s Ross!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I’m telling you Rachel, listen to Janice. They all say they’re gonna be there until they start their real family.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well I—That’s never gonna happen with Ross.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh well that’s what I thought about my first husband, now I’m lucky if my kid gets to spend the weekend with her father and the twins and little Ms. New Boobs.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I hate to be the one to say it, but honey you two are on your own.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well… That’s…y’know—That’s—We’ve been alone for the last twenty minutes we’re doing okay. Besides y’know what? I-I—Maybe we won’t be alone, ‘cause lately I-I—things have been happening between me and Ross, y’know? Right before I went into labor, we-we had this kiss. Y’know? So it might be the…the beginning of something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Janice!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who’s this little guy?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Say hello to Aaron, your future son-in-law.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no. No.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I’m gonna leave the three of you alone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Man! Did you see the kid on that nose?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Y’know what I was, I was thinking about?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm…that kiss before we left the apartment. That was some-something huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, it really was. But we…we gotta be careful. We…we can’t let that happen again, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean we don’t want to go down that road do we?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! No, of course not. No. That’s why I brought it up. They didn’t have any sodas?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! I’m sorry, I was talking to this nurse, completely forgot.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s all right. And so it begins.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is she in there?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. She’s putting her down now, that’s her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look at Emma!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just can’t decide who she looks more alike, you or Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh what are you kidding? She’s gorgeous, it’s all Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m sorry, for the last time, why aren’t you two together again? No, I know. I know, because you’re not in that place. Which would be fine, except you totally are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s…it’s complicated okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that’s true. Yeah, you love her. You always have. You have a child together. There is no right answer.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, we’ve been together. Okay? And then apart, and then together, and then apart, and now we have a baby. It’s just if-if we got together again and it didn’t work out…I could never do that to Emma. I mean she-she thinking everything— Oh that’s…now me. What do they put something in the water in this place? Since Rachel and I we’re doing really, we’re doing really well right now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. I know. I know. I know, and if you try to make it more you might wreck it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, exactly.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right. Or you might get everything you’ve wanted since you were fifteen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. I just saw a woman breast feeding both of her twins at the same time; it is like a freak show up here. What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What is it? Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really it’s nothing. I’m just…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach come on, what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ve just been thinking about how my baby and I are gonna be all alone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you talking about alone? What about Ross?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh please, he’ll be with his real family, the twins and little miss new boobs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, how long was I watching that woman?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m just saying that y’know, someday Ross is gonna meet somebody and…he’s gonna have his own life. Right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just never thought I would raise this baby all by myself. Pretty dumb huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, listen to me, listen to me…you are never ever gonna be alone. Okay? I promise that’s not gonna happen.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey. Honey what would I do without you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don’t have to worry about that okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hon can you grab me my other box of tissues? They’re right on that chair under Ross’s coat.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My God.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God. Okay.
